sn9.12:1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu vihārati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe. Atha kho tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā tassa bhikkhuno santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn9.12:2: "Ṭhite majjhanhike kāle,sannisīvesu pakkhisu;Saṇateva brahāraññaṁ,taṁ bhayaṁ paṭibhāti maṁ.
sn9.12:3: Ṭhite majjhanhike kāle,sannisīvesu pakkhisu;Saṇateva brahāraññaṁ,sā rati paṭibhāti man"ti.
